main event: A silver teardrop-shaped object was sighted moving quickly to the east in Dedham, Massachusetts on 22 September 1960.
interesting points: The object was small and silent, estimated to be about the size of a Polaris., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., Witness observes the object moving quickly without any significant sound., The object appeared to be metallic and hovered for a duration of 30-35 minutes during another separate observation., Weather conditions were clear and calm at the time.
witness description: Witnesses located on the edge of Boston, observing a metallic object in the sky.
